document_data.name: Phantaizha
document_data.mainbody:
'''Phantaizha''' was a patron of the [[Elfsong Tavern]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|Look away. Act like you don't know me. Come on, be a pal.|Phantaizha}}
document_data.Description: Phantaizha was a [[human]] woman with a light skin tone, short blonde hair, and brown eyes. She wore quality finery and seemed to think she was famous.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Phantaizha was a frequent customer of the Elfsong Tavern in the [[Baldur's Gate/Eastway|Eastway]] neighborhood of Baldur's Gate. She attended the "Laff Riot" show at the Elfong, a stand-up comedy performance hosted by [[Harvard Willoughby]] in Elfsong's side room with a stage. Phantaizha attended the show while incognito, trying to avoid being recognized.
